word_mean: 柿，又称：柿(Diospyros kaki L. f.)

sentence.Network_en: I stood under the persimmon tree, looking at the lone little persimmon.
sentence.Network_cn: 我仍旧站在那棵柿子树下, 望着树梢上那个孤零零的小火柿子.

sentence.Network_en: Look at that little persimmon orchard in the west valley.
sentence.Network_cn: 你瞧,西面山涯里那一片柿树,红得多么好看.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: alteration of Algonquian pessemmins

entry.def: A persimmon is a soft, orange fruit that looks rather like a large tomato. Persimmons grow on trees in hot countries.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several tropical trees of the genus Diospyros
2. orange fruit resembling a plum; edible when fully ripe
